name: Gopnik Simulator
description: This is a clicker game in which you play for gopnik. Eat sunflower seeds, talk with friends, drink and increase your skill!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb DirectX: Version 10
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 Gb DirectX: Version 11
